customerDescription:
Tasty Side Salad made with mixed leaves and topped with sliced juicy tomatoes and cucumber.

Fancy a bit on the side? Of course you do! Part of our Balanced Choice range, our tasty Side Salad is made with mixed leaves and topped with sliced juicy tomatoes and cucumber. Did we mention it’s one of your five a day? Bonus! Served with a sachet of Heinz Salad Cream for a dashing of dressing.

Pair it with our tasty Southern Fried Chicken Goujons or a Hot Vegan Ham and Cheese Baguette for a top tier lunch.
Any Breakfast Baguette Deal & Large drink or a regular premium flavoured drink

options.customerDescription:
Rashers of oven cooked bacon packed in a crusty baguette. Okay, it’s time to admit it. The adults were right all along.

Breakfast IS the most important meal of the day. But, sometimes a bowl of cereal just isn’t going to cut it, you know?

The Bacon Breakfast Baguette is ideal for those mornings when you need just a little bit more. Rashers of succulent bacon packed in a crusty baguette, which are baked fresh in our shops every single day.

Great as it is, OR, if you’re feeling saucy, we’ve got Heinz Ketchup and HP Sauce on tap. Bon Appétit!

Oven cooked pork sausages packed into a crusty baguette. Oh, hello. Bangers for brekkie, now we are talking.

If you have a hankering for a proper breakfast, a wonderfully refreshing wake-up call, or even just a something for Instagram, you’ve come to the right place.

The Sausage Breakfast Baguette is ideal for those mornings when you need just a little bit more than a breakfast roll. Freshly cooked sausages packed into a freshly baked baguette, which are baked fresh in our shops every single day.

All it needs is a little dash of HP or Ketchup (Heinz of course). Breakfast-y bliss.

A deliciously cheesy omelette packed in a crusty baguette. Ah the omelette.

The hard-boiled egg’s cool younger cousin, who was popular at school, loved by almost everyone, and looks great inside a crusty baguette.

Wait, what? Our Cheddar cheese Omelette Breakfast Baguette is ideal for those mornings when you need just a little bit more than a Breakfast Roll. We’re also proud owners of the Good Egg Award, so you can rest safe knowing our eggy goodness has been well looked after.

Enjoy it plain or with sauce of your choice. Egg-cellent.

This tasty treat is a source of protein

Crispy bacon rashers and pork sausages in a crusty baguette. Prepare to get the good times started with this breakfast hero.

Perfectly crispy bacon rashers? We’re feeling it. Beautifully cooked pork sausages? Stop it, you flirt. Stuffed into a freshly baked baguette? Now. We’re. Talking.

If you’re of the belief that bacon and sausage is the undefeated breakfast combination, then we’re not here to disagree. Simply top it with Heinz Tomato Ketchup or HP Sauce and get ready for a party in your mouth. Oh, and our crusty baguettes are freshly baked in shops every day… Just how you like them.

Fairtrade Orange Juice made from concentrate.

Perfect for breakfast (or any meal, come to think of it), our Fairtrade Orange Juice is made from concentrate

The sharp, orangey flavours make for a punchy soft drink that treats your taste buds to a party! The perfect contrast of sweet and sour, this fabulous looking and even better tasting concoction offers optimum flavour satisfaction. Top tier.

If you're looking to be whisked away to a hot summer's day then look no further.

Classically refreshing Fairtrade Apple Juice.

Sip sip, hurray!

We know you. We know you spent years leaving that apple in your lunchbox.

But, now you’ve truly come to appreciate the wonder of the flavour of apple. And good news, we’re here to make it even better.

A little sharp and super sweet, our Apple Juice is so classically refreshing that it doesn’t need the big sell. Not only does it taste great but our Apple Juice is one of your five a day (per 150ml) and 100% Fairtrade.

(Recommended 150ml portion of apple juice counts as 1 of your 5-a-day. Apple Juice made from concentrate)

Small still Natural Water bottled in the Brecon Beacons. Playing in the paddling pool. Brushing our teeth. Powering a gym session. Where would we be without this little fella?

Sure, water may be the slightly more boring, predictable and dependable member of the soft drinks family. But, it’s still a gem to us.

Our refreshing Still Natural Mineral Water is bottled in the Brecon Beacons National Park at the foot of the Black Mountain Range. As refreshing as it gets.

A double shot of freshly ground Fairtrade Espresso and steamed milk. There are two things you should know about us.

1: we love food (obviously) and 2: we absolutely lurrrrve a good Latte.

Our coffee is our own unique blend of mild, high grown and rich tasting Arabica and Robusta beans. Not only does it taste AH-mazing but our beans are 100% Fairtrade. We really could sit and chat forever about the love and care that goes into producing our coffee, as well as the farmers that we support. For more info on this, visit our Responsible Sourcing page.

This little cup of pick-me-up is made just the way you all know and love, with a double shot of freshly ground Espresso and steamed milk. Simple as that.

Freshly ground coffee with a generous helping of foam on top, topped with chocolate powder.

If you’re anything like us you’ll know that drinking coffee is infinitely more fun the frothier you go.

Think about it. Those teeny, tiny bubbles make your drink look just like a miniature bathtub, the chocolate powder on top is to DIE for, and don’t even start us with the milk-stache. Oh yeah.

Our freshly ground coffee is our own unique blend of mild, high grown and rich tasting Arabica and Robusta beans. Not only does it taste pretty darn delicious, but the beans are also 100% Fairtrade.

A simple, quality coffee made with Fairtrade coffee beans and semi-skimmed milk. Short, strong and full of beans. If you’re after a no-nonsense, does what it says on the tin coffee boost, this one should do just the trick.

Of course, at the heart of any great Americano, is a high quality, freshly ground Espresso. Ours is made from our own unique blend of mild, high grown and rich tasting Arabica and Robusta beans. Not only does it taste INCREDIBLE but our coffee beans are 100% Fairtrade.

Tastes good, does good.

Freshly ground Espresso Coffee. Short, strong and full of beans. If you’re after a no-nonsense, does what it says on the tin coffee boost, this one should do just the trick.

Of course, at the heart of any great Americano, is a high quality, freshly ground Espresso. Ours is made from our own unique blend of mild, high grown and rich tasting Arabica and Robusta beans. Not only does it taste INCREDIBLE but our coffee beans are 100% Fairtrade.

Tastes good, does good.

A double shot of Espresso, steamed milk, sweet vanilla syrup and not forgetting the 'piece de resistance' cream topping.

Our delicious Vanilla Latte is made with freshly ground Fairtrade coffee beans, semi-skimmed milk, vanilla flavour syrup, topped with hot chocolate powder. Yum.

A classic English breakfast tea made with Fairtrade Tea leaves. It’s everyone’s go-to drink, whatever the mood. And who can blame them?

Cold? Cup of Tea. Sad? Cup of Tea. Bored? Cup of Tea. Dumped? You guessed it, better grab a cup of Tea. Not only is Tea the solution to most of the nation’s problems, but it also tastes pretty darn excellent. Especially with a Jammie Heart Biscuit.

Deliciously decadent hot chocolate made with Fairtrade milk chocolate. We love chocolate. And by ‘love’ we mean ‘are obsessed with’. But sometimes, a piece of chocolate just won’t cut it, you know? That’s why we’ve turned up the heat, to give to you our deliciously decadent Fairtrade Hot Chocolate.

Personally, it’s a fave of ours for ANY time of year.

…but if you are experiencing a particularly wet and dreary day (let’s face it, it’s the UK), we can guarantee this will hit the spot.

So, have a taste. Let it slowly melt in your mouth, and watch as those rose-tinted, chocolate-shaped endorphins magically reveal themselves. We just LOVE to see all your pretty, smiley faces sipping on this little cup of magic.

Freshly ground Espresso, steamed milk and cocoa. It might look like the Greggs latte that all we know and love, but we promise you what’s inside this little cup is much more than that.

Hear us out: Coffee. AND Hot Chocolate. Together. Genius.

It tastes good, it looks good, it might pick you up a few likes on Insta, win-win really isn’t it? Freshly ground espresso, steamed milk and cocoa. Like all our coffee our Mocha is jam packed with our own unique blend of mild, high grown and rich tasting Arabica and Robusta beans. Not only does it taste bloomin’ marvellous but the coffee beans are 100% Fairtrade.

Espresso with steamed milk, hot chocolate, mint flavoured syrup, whipped cream and chocolate sprinkles.

Mint + Chocolate? Sounds controversial but hear us out.

Our mouth-watering Mint Mocha is made with freshly ground Fairtrade Espresso, steamed milk, hot chocolate and mint flavoured syrup with sweetener, perfectly finished with a whipped cream topping and chocolate sprinkles.

Like all our freshly ground coffee, our Mint Mocha is packed with our own unique blend of mild, high grown and rich tasting Arabica and Robusta beans. Not only does it taste out of this world, but the coffee beans are 100% Fairtrade.

Made with Fairtrade cocoa powder, semi skimmed milk and mint flavoured syrup. We’ve taken our original, deliciously decadent Fairtrade Hot chocolate and given it a festive twist with delicious mint flavoured syrup, an indulgent cream topping and a sprinkle of chocolate to finish. The perfect winter warmer to get you through the cold British weather, not to mention it tastes AH-mazing!

Freshly ground coffee beans, frothy milk, salted caramel flavour syrup, whipped cream a drizzle of caramel sauce.

The days are getting shorter, the nights are getting darker and leaving the house in anything other than three layers of clothing is becoming impossible. It’s times like these we all need a little pick me up, a little cup of indulgence. That’s where our Salted Caramel Latte comes in. Made with freshly ground coffee beans, frothy milk and salted caramel flavour syrup, finished off with a whipped cream topping and a drizzle of salted caramel sauce. Not only does it taste bloomin’ marvellous but the coffee beans are 100% Fairtrade.

customerDescription: Any Breakfast Roll with a large drink or a regular premium flavoured drink

options.customerDescription:
Oven baked bacon rashers in a corn top breakfast roll.

Okay, it’s time to admit it. Our parents were right all along.

Breakfast IS the most important meal of the day. But, with the nation’s favourite bacon roll in a Greggs shop near you, who really has time to make brekkie at home?

No frills. No fuss. Just three rashers of deliciously oven baked bacon, in a pillow-soft, melt-in-your-mouth, white breakfast roll.  All it needs is a little dash of HP or Ketchup (Heinz of course). Breakfast-y bliss.

Oven baked sausages in a corn top breakfast roll.

When something just works, we don’t like messing with it too much.

If you’re looking at this combo of freshly cooked sausages, a pillow-soft, white breakfast roll plus a generous dollop of sauce, and saying YESYESYES, you’re probably our kind of person.

Because, let’s be real, the type of people who order this beauty midweek tend to love a party and enjoy getting stuck in. You’re the good guys.

Freshly prepared every morning, all it needs is a little dash of HP or Ketchup (Heinz of course).

Cheesy omelette in a corn top breakfast roll. Eggs.

They actually are all they’re cracked up to be, you know.

Especially when they’re whipped into a Cheddar cheese omelette, packed into a pillow-soft, white breakfast roll, and lathered with a dollop of Ketchup on top, from our good friends at Heinz.

We’re also proud owners of the Good Egg Award, so you can rest safe knowing our eggy goodness has been well looked after.

The Good Egg Award recognises companies that use cage-free eggs or egg products. To date more than 99 million laying hens are set to benefit each year from award winners’ policies.

customerDescription: Choose one of our tasty porridge pots with a drink.

options.customerDescription:
Classic gluten-free porridge pot. Slow start? Gloomy weather? Yeah... us too. Not to worry, we'll sort you out with our delicious pot of hot porridge.

This classic breakfast is a tasty way to fuel up on your way from A to B. Pick up a pot next time you’re passing by and enjoy a hot and wholesome start to the day. Made to order, our porridge pot makes a pretty nifty hand warmer too! And it's gluten-free.

Deliciously sweet gluten-free porridge with golden syrup. Slow start? Grim weather? Let us soften the early morning slog, with our tasty pot of hot porridge.

We've made this classic breakfast even more delicious, with a generous helping of golden syrup flavour. A great way to recharge your batteries, it also makes a pretty nifty hand warmer on your way from A to B. And it's gluten-free.

Deliciously sweet gluten-free porridge with dried apple and ground cinnamon. Slow start? Grim weather? Let us soften the early morning slog, with our tasty pot of hot porridge.

This little cup of pick-me-up is made just the way you all know and love, with a double shot of freshly ground Espresso and steamed milk. Simple as that.

Freshly ground coffee with a generous helping of foam on top, topped with chocolate powder.

If you’re anything like us you’ll know that drinking coffee is infinitely more fun the frothier you go.

Think about it. Those teeny, tiny bubbles make your drink look just like a miniature bathtub, the chocolate powder on top is to DIE for, and don’t even start us with the milk-stache. Oh yeah.

Our freshly ground coffee is our own unique blend of mild, high grown and rich tasting Arabica and Robusta beans. Not only does it taste pretty darn delicious, but the beans are also 100% Fairtrade.

A simple, quality coffee made with Fairtrade coffee beans and semi-skimmed milk. Short, strong and full of beans. If you’re after a no-nonsense, does what it says on the tin coffee boost, this one should do just the trick.

Of course, at the heart of any great Americano, is a high quality, freshly ground Espresso. Ours is made from our own unique blend of mild, high grown and rich tasting Arabica and Robusta beans. Not only does it taste INCREDIBLE but our coffee beans are 100% Fairtrade.

Tastes good, does good.

Freshly ground Espresso Coffee. Short, strong and full of beans. If you’re after a no-nonsense, does what it says on the tin coffee boost, this one should do just the trick.

Of course, at the heart of any great Americano, is a high quality, freshly ground Espresso. Ours is made from our own unique blend of mild, high grown and rich tasting Arabica and Robusta beans. Not only does it taste INCREDIBLE but our coffee beans are 100% Fairtrade.

Tastes good, does good.

Double Espresso, topped with steamed and lightly frothed milk.

If you’re the type of person looking for a ‘triple-decker-half-caffe-venti-macchiacco’ with your name scribbled incorrectly on the side (it’s Greggs with two G’s, come on)… then we suggest you look away now.

Here at Greggs, we like to keep things simple. Quality products, great prices. That’s why we love the Flat White. Admired by hipsters, grannies, and students alike. This fool-proof coffee order is our go-to crowd pleaser. Double Espresso, topped with steamed and lightly frothed milk. It's strong and served short, just how it's supposed to be.

Oh, and all of our coffee beans are 100% Fairtrade and freshly ground just for you.

A classic English breakfast tea made with Fairtrade Tea leaves. It’s everyone’s go-to drink, whatever the mood. And who can blame them?

Cold? Cup of Tea. Sad? Cup of Tea. Bored? Cup of Tea. Dumped? You guessed it, better grab a cup of Tea. Not only is Tea the solution to most of the nation’s problems, but it also tastes pretty darn excellent. Especially with a Jammie Heart Biscuit.

Deliciously decadent hot chocolate made with Fairtrade milk chocolate. We love chocolate. And by ‘love’ we mean ‘are obsessed with’. But sometimes, a piece of chocolate just won’t cut it, you know? That’s why we’ve turned up the heat, to give to you our deliciously decadent Fairtrade Hot Chocolate.

Personally, it’s a fave of ours for ANY time of year.

…but if you are experiencing a particularly wet and dreary day (let’s face it, it’s the UK), we can guarantee this will hit the spot.

So, have a taste. Let it slowly melt in your mouth, and watch as those rose-tinted, chocolate-shaped endorphins magically reveal themselves. We just LOVE to see all your pretty, smiley faces sipping on this little cup of magic.

Freshly ground Espresso, steamed milk and cocoa. It might look like the Greggs latte that all we know and love, but we promise you what’s inside this little cup is much more than that.

Hear us out: Coffee. AND Hot Chocolate. Together. Genius.

It tastes good, it looks good, it might pick you up a few likes on Insta, win-win really isn’t it? Freshly ground espresso, steamed milk and cocoa. Like all our coffee our Mocha is jam packed with our own unique blend of mild, high grown and rich tasting Arabica and Robusta beans. Not only does it taste bloomin’ marvellous but the coffee beans are 100% Fairtrade.

Freshly prepared every morning, all it needs is a little dash of HP or Ketchup (Heinz of course).

A tasty combo of oven baked bacon and pork sausages in a corn top breakfast roll. Now we’re talking.

If you’re looking at this combo of sausage, bacon rashers and a pillow-soft corn topped roll, then there’s a 99% chance that your mouth is watering. We’re right, aren’t we?

And, if this is your breakfast go-to, it’s safe to say you’re probably a firm believer in ‘if it ain’t broke, don’t fix it’. You don’t care for the latest fads. And even though you’ve never even tried smashed avocado on toast, you feel obliged in saying it could NEVER be as good as bacon and sausage. We like your style. Top with Heinz Tomato Ketchup or HP Sauce and you’re onto an even bigger winner.

Cheesy omelette in a corn top breakfast roll. Eggs.

They actually are all they’re cracked up to be, you know.

Especially when they’re whipped into a Cheddar cheese omelette, packed into a pillow-soft, white breakfast roll, and lathered with a dollop of Ketchup on top, from our good friends at Heinz.

The Good Egg Award recognises companies that use cage-free eggs or egg products. To date more than 99 million laying hens are set to benefit each year from award winners’ policies.

Rashers of oven cooked bacon packed in a crusty baguette. Okay, it’s time to admit it. The adults were right all along.

Breakfast IS the most important meal of the day. But, sometimes a bowl of cereal just isn’t going to cut it, you know?

The Bacon Breakfast Baguette is ideal for those mornings when you need just a little bit more. Rashers of succulent bacon packed in a crusty baguette, which are baked fresh in our shops every single day.

Great as it is, OR, if you’re feeling saucy, we’ve got Heinz Ketchup and HP Sauce on tap. Bon Appétit!

Oven cooked pork sausages packed into a crusty baguette. Oh, hello. Bangers for brekkie, now we are talking.

If you have a hankering for a proper breakfast, a wonderfully refreshing wake-up call, or even just a something for Instagram, you’ve come to the right place.

The Sausage Breakfast Baguette is ideal for those mornings when you need just a little bit more than a breakfast roll. Freshly cooked sausages packed into a freshly baked baguette, which are baked fresh in our shops every single day.

All it needs is a little dash of HP or Ketchup (Heinz of course). Breakfast-y bliss.

Crispy bacon rashers and pork sausages in a crusty baguette. Prepare to get the good times started with this breakfast hero.

Perfectly crispy bacon rashers? We’re feeling it. Beautifully cooked pork sausages? Stop it, you flirt. Stuffed into a freshly baked baguette? Now. We’re. Talking.

If you’re of the belief that bacon and sausage is the undefeated breakfast combination, then we’re not here to disagree. Simply top it with Heinz Tomato Ketchup or HP Sauce and get ready for a party in your mouth. Oh, and our crusty baguettes are freshly baked in shops every day… Just how you like them.

A deliciously cheesy omelette packed in a crusty baguette. Ah the omelette.

The hard-boiled egg’s cool younger cousin, who was popular at school, loved by almost everyone, and looks great inside a crusty baguette.

Wait, what? Our Cheddar cheese Omelette Breakfast Baguette is ideal for those mornings when you need just a little bit more than a Breakfast Roll. We’re also proud owners of the Good Egg Award, so you can rest safe knowing our eggy goodness has been well looked after.

Enjoy it plain or with sauce of your choice. Egg-cellent.

This tasty treat is a source of protein

Delicious bacon and tangy Cheddar cheese wrapped in our famous flakey pastry.

We know what you’re thinking. It doesn’t get much better than bacon. WRONG. You obviously didn’t think about cheese. Now imagine if we said you could have them both. Together. Wrapped in a deliciously crisp, flakey puff pastry? Well…guess what? You can!

Our Bacon and Cheese Wrap is made from a deliciously flakey puff pastry, filled with crispy unsmoked back bacon and a slice of tangy Cheddar cheese. A match made in Greggs heaven.

Made from shredded potatoes, lovingly seasoned and perfectly fried, then baked in store until crisp and brown.

Now we’re not claiming to be New Yorkers or know everything there is to know about Root Beer and The Statue of Liberty. But trust us, we know what makes a good Hash Brown.

Making a cool, calm and collected entrance to our already top-notch Breakfast menu, we give you the ONE, THE ONLY, Hash Brown.

Made from shredded potatoes, lovingly seasoned and perfectly fried, then baked in store until crisp and brown. Our Hash Browns are the perfect addition to have alongside your Breakfast Roll and morning coffee.

Golden pastry with a rich dark chocolate filling.

Everyone knows that the only thing better than breakfast is… well dessert, obviously. But, combine the two together? Pure magic.

It is widely acknowledged (and we tend to agree) that chocolate is a superior dessert compared to the rest. Similarly, Greggs pastries are simply devine, so pair the two together and; ‘Voila!’, you’re onto a winner.

Deliciously soft, our deliciously decadent Pain au Chocolat is great for snacking on the go, or from the comfort of your own bed.

Watch out for crumbs, though.

Fabulously fluffy and flakey all butter Croissant. We don’t know about you, but we think it’s about time you switched things up from your usual, boring toast. No offence, toast.

Blissfully fluffy. Moreishly buttery. Fabulously flakey.

Our delicious All Butter Croissant - perfect for snacking on the go, or serving up with a continental breakfast, the Parisians really do know how to eat in style.

Classic gluten-free porridge pot. Slow start? Gloomy weather? Yeah... us too. Not to worry, we'll sort you out with our delicious pot of hot porridge.

This classic breakfast is a tasty way to fuel up on your way from A to B. Pick up a pot next time you’re passing by and enjoy a hot and wholesome start to the day. Made to order, our porridge pot makes a pretty nifty hand warmer too! And it's gluten-free.

Deliciously sweet gluten-free porridge with golden syrup. Slow start? Grim weather? Let us soften the early morning slog, with our tasty pot of hot porridge.

We've made this classic breakfast even more delicious, with a generous helping of golden syrup flavour. A great way to recharge your batteries, it also makes a pretty nifty hand warmer on your way from A to B. And it's gluten-free.

Deliciously sweet gluten-free porridge with dried apple and ground cinnamon. Slow start? Grim weather? Let us soften the early morning slog, with our tasty pot of hot porridge.

We've made this classic breakfast even more delicious, with a generous helping of apple and cinnamon. A great way to recharge your batteries, it also makes a pretty nifty hand warmer on your way from A to B. And it's gluten-free.
A delicious Bake and a regular hot drink

options.customerDescription:
Let’s be honest, the countdown to Christmas doesn’t really begin until you’ve had that first bite of a Festive Bake. Like the obligatory pair of socks in your stocking every year or the office party that always gets out of hand, it just wouldn’t be Christmas without it.

Made from a delicious crumb topped pastry, filled with pieces of cooked chicken, sage & onion stuffing and cooked sweetcure bacon, covered in a creamy sage & cranberry sauce.

The Greggs Festive Bake - Hands down the most Christmassy thing about Christmas.

Puff pastry filled with savoury Quorn™, stuffing, vegan bacon crumb and sage & cranberry sauce.

Over the years the Festive Bake has got a bit lonely up there in the spotlight. It longed for a companion just as magnificent, just as tasty and just as festive. Many have tried but none have succeeded. Made from delicious puff pastry, filled with savoury flavour Quorn™ mycoprotein pieces, sage & onion stuffing balls and vegan bacon crumb, finished with a mouth-watering sage & cranberry sauce.

There have been rare cases of allergic reactions to products containing mycoprotein. Mycoprotein is made with a member of the fungi/mould family. Mycoprotein is high in protein and fibre which may cause intolerance in some people.

Diced beef in a rich and tasty gravy, wrapped in a golden puff pastry parcel. If you’re after a little taste of lunchtime lovin’ baked in the oven, then you’ve come to the right place.

Packed with diced cuts of prime beef in a rich and tasty gravy, this golden puff pastry parcel has been a firm favourite for years.

AND, since they’re freshly baked in our shops every day, there’s probably one coming out of the oven RIGHT now.

Unless you’re reading this at 4am. In which case, go to bed. And dream of tomorrow.

A classic duo of cheese and onion wrapped in a light puff pastry. Now, we’re not one for bold claims. We’d never, for example, claim that we invented the internet, or that we discovered France. So, we’re certainly not going to stamp our name on ‘cheese and onion’. After all, that tasty flavour combination has been around for ages.

But what we will say is, very few have managed to bundle the classic duo into a savoury quite like our Cheese and Onion Bake. Made with a blend of cheeses and diced onion, they’re freshly baked in our shops every day.

Fresh, simple, and with more cheese than a 90’s rom com. Perhaps it’s time you rediscovered this tasty classic.

Sausages, beans and melted cheese wrapped in a golden puff pastry. Some things were made for each other. Strawberries and cream… Ant and Dec… burgers and gherkins …well, maybe not everything.

But there’s one thing that nobody can deny, and it’s that sausages, beans and cheese are a match made in pastry heaven.

Bursting with delectable baked beans, our sausage meatballs, and gloriously gooey melted cheese, we can just about guarantee that our Sausage Bean and Cheese Melt will tickle your tastebuds.

Chicken breast pieces in a creamy white sauce wrapped in puff pastry. As a fully fledged Nation of bake lovers, we think it’s only fair we take a moment to shine the spotlight on this timeless classic.

Across Greggs’ many valiant years in the bakery business, we’ve seen our fair share of bakes come and go.

The Chicken Bake undoubtedly has stood the test of time. Always there. In the background. Never hogging the limelight, but always delivering the flavour.

Made with chicken breast pieces in a rich and creamy white sauce, these taste sensations are wrapped in golden puff pastry – making them the perfect choice for eating anywhere, at any time.

Delicious bacon and tangy Cheddar cheese wrapped in our famous flakey pastry.

We know what you’re thinking. It doesn’t get much better than bacon. WRONG. You obviously didn’t think about cheese. Now imagine if we said you could have them both. Together. Wrapped in a deliciously crisp, flakey puff pastry? Well…guess what? You can!

Our Bacon and Cheese Wrap is made from a deliciously flakey puff pastry, filled with crispy unsmoked back bacon and a slice of tangy Cheddar cheese. A match made in Greggs heaven.

Golden puff pastry filled with chunks of seasoned beef, veg and gravy.

Our Beef and Vegetable Pasty is a thing of beauty. Packed with chunks of seasoned beef with potato, onions and gravy. Plus, to give it our own touch we add carrots and peas.

Controversial, we know. But we like a few colourful veggies in there. Then lightly seasoned and wrapped in delicious, golden puff pastry.

customerDescription: A delicious Savoury Roll and a regular hot drink

options.customerDescription:
The Nation’s favourite Sausage Roll. Much like Elvis was hailed the King of Rock, many have appointed Greggs as the (unofficial) King of Sausage Rolls.

Freshly baked in our shops throughout the day, this British classic is made from seasoned sausage meat wrapped in layers of crisp, golden puff pastry, as well as a large dollop of TLC. It’s fair to say, we’re proper proud of them.

And that’s it. No clever twist. No secret ingredient. It’s how you like them, so that’s how we make them.

Deliciously light puff pastry with a seasoned Quorn filling. The most hotly debated sausage roll since, well... the Sausage Roll.

Unless you were living under a very large, very heavy rock for most of 2019, you may have noticed we rustled up some serious feathers for Veganuary that year.

Our Vegan Sausage Roll is carefully designed to mirror some of the original Sausage Roll’s classic features, including around 96 layers of deliciously light puff pastry. If it aint broke, right?

BUT… instead we wrap it around our own bespoke filling, developed with the help of our friends over at Quorn. And, in our humble opinion, it continues to be a gamechanger.

(There have been rare cases of allergic reactions to products containing mycoprotein. Mycoprotein is made with a member of the fungi/mould family. It is high in protein and fibre which may cause intolerance in some people.)

customerDescription:
The Nation’s favourite Sausage Roll. Much like Elvis was hailed the King of Rock, many have appointed Greggs as the (unofficial) King of Sausage Rolls.

Freshly baked in our shops throughout the day, this British classic is made from seasoned sausage meat wrapped in layers of crisp, golden puff pastry, as well as a large dollop of TLC. It’s fair to say, we’re proper proud of them.

And that’s it. No clever twist. No secret ingredient. It’s how you like them, so that’s how we make them.

Deliciously light puff pastry with a seasoned Quorn filling. The most hotly debated sausage roll since, well... the Sausage Roll.

Unless you were living under a very large, very heavy rock for most of 2019, you may have noticed we rustled up some serious feathers for Veganuary that year.

Our Vegan Sausage Roll is carefully designed to mirror some of the original Sausage Roll’s classic features, including around 96 layers of deliciously light puff pastry. If it aint broke, right?

BUT… instead we wrap it around our own bespoke filling, developed with the help of our friends over at Quorn. And, in our humble opinion, it continues to be a gamechanger.

(There have been rare cases of allergic reactions to products containing mycoprotein. Mycoprotein is made with a member of the fungi/mould family. It is high in protein and fibre which may cause intolerance in some people.)

Let’s be honest, the countdown to Christmas doesn’t really begin until you’ve had that first bite of a Festive Bake. Like the obligatory pair of socks in your stocking every year or the office party that always gets out of hand, it just wouldn’t be Christmas without it.

Made from a delicious crumb topped pastry, filled with pieces of cooked chicken, sage & onion stuffing and cooked sweetcure bacon, covered in a creamy sage & cranberry sauce.

The Greggs Festive Bake - Hands down the most Christmassy thing about Christmas.

*Nutritional information is per bake

Share the joy this Christmas with two Vegan Festive Bakes

Puff pastry filled with savoury Quorn™, stuffing, vegan bacon crumb and sage & cranberry sauce.

Over the years the Festive Bake has got a bit lonely up there in the spotlight. It longed for a companion just as magnificent, just as tasty and just as festive. Many have tried but none have succeeded. Made from delicious puff pastry, filled with savoury flavour Quorn™ mycoprotein pieces, sage & onion stuffing balls and vegan bacon crumb, finished with a mouth-watering sage & cranberry sauce.

There have been rare cases of allergic reactions to products containing mycoprotein. Mycoprotein is made with a member of the fungi/mould family. Mycoprotein is high in protein and fibre which may cause intolerance in some people.

A classic duo of cheese and onion wrapped in a light puff pastry. Now, we’re not one for bold claims. We’d never, for example, claim that we invented the internet, or that we discovered France. So, we’re certainly not going to stamp our name on ‘cheese and onion’. After all, that tasty flavour combination has been around for ages.

But what we will say is, very few have managed to bundle the classic duo into a savoury quite like our Cheese and Onion Bake. Made with a blend of cheeses and diced onion, they’re freshly baked in our shops every day.

Fresh, simple, and with more cheese than a 90’s rom com. Perhaps it’s time you rediscovered this tasty classic.

Diced beef in a rich and tasty gravy, wrapped in a golden puff pastry parcel. If you’re after a little taste of lunchtime lovin’ baked in the oven, then you’ve come to the right place.

Packed with diced cuts of prime beef in a rich and tasty gravy, this golden puff pastry parcel has been a firm favourite for years.

AND, since they’re freshly baked in our shops every day, there’s probably one coming out of the oven RIGHT now.

Unless you’re reading this at 4am. In which case, go to bed. And dream of tomorrow.

Chicken breast pieces in a creamy white sauce wrapped in puff pastry. As a fully fledged Nation of bake lovers, we think it’s only fair we take a moment to shine the spotlight on this timeless classic.

Across Greggs’ many valiant years in the bakery business, we’ve seen our fair share of bakes come and go.

The Chicken Bake undoubtedly has stood the test of time. Always there. In the background. Never hogging the limelight, but always delivering the flavour.

Made with chicken breast pieces in a rich and creamy white sauce, these taste sensations are wrapped in golden puff pastry – making them the perfect choice for eating anywhere, at any time.

Sausages, beans and melted cheese wrapped in a golden puff pastry. Some things were made for each other. Strawberries and cream… Ant and Dec… burgers and gherkins …well, maybe not everything.

But there’s one thing that nobody can deny, and it’s that sausages, beans and cheese are a match made in pastry heaven.

Bursting with delectable baked beans, our sausage meatballs, and gloriously gooey melted cheese, we can just about guarantee that our Sausage Bean and Cheese Melt will tickle your tastebuds.
The Nation's favourite Sausage Roll, made from seasoned sausage meat and wrapped in layers of crisp, golden puff pastry.

Golden puff pastry filled with chunks of seasoned beef, veg and gravy.

Our Beef and Vegetable Pasty is a thing of beauty. Packed with chunks of seasoned beef with potato, onions and gravy. Plus, to give it our own touch we add carrots and peas.

Controversial, we know. But we like a few colourful veggies in there. Then lightly seasoned and wrapped in delicious, golden puff pastry.

Customise your own Greggs Pizza with a choice of toppings. Just when you thought it couldn’t get any better than our legendary Pizza slices… Introducing the brand new, customisable Pizza (Greggs-style!)

Inspired by our Italian cousins, our Pizza slices are made from focaccia style bases with a rich layer of our unique recipe pizza sauce and topped with delicious cheese.

On top of the tomato and cheese base, you can also choose to add three additional tasty toppings, including Chargrill Chicken, Mexican Chicken, Pepperoni, Red Onion, Jalapenos and Mixed Peppers.

If that’s not enough to have you saying ‘Magnifico!’, we don’t know what is.

customerDescription:
A blend of cheeses on a tomato focaccia style base.

Creative bunch, the Italians. Not only were they famous for aqueducts and mascarpone cheese, they’re also responsible for the greatest bready creation since... well, sliced bread!

So, if there were ever a time to pat the Italians on the back and thank them for creating such exceptional eats, it’s now.

Our Margherita Pizza has a blend of cheeses on a focaccia style base. Plus, the sauciest pizza sauce that you ever did taste. If that doesn’t make you want to kiss your fingers and shout ‘Magnifico!’, we don’t know what will.

Carbonated mango, pineapple and passion fruit soft drink with sweeteners. Gloomy day outside? Wishing you were lying by the pool with a glass of something cold in your hand?

Well, we might not be able to promise the rain will stay away but our Sparkling Mango & Pineapple drink will make you feel like you're in warmer climates.

Tangy, tasty and tropical... it really is summer in a bottle!

A classic raspberry flavoured sparkling drink. The Sparkling Raspberry Lemonade.

Deliciously raspberry flavoured, this sweet, fruity and fizzy little bombshell delivers a splash of perfectly pink hue onto our shelves, making for the most Instagrammable soft drink on the Greggs menu. If you’re looking for an even bigger dose of pink, why not pair it with a Pink Jammie Doughnut?

Refreshing on a hot day, and just as tasty on a cold one; we loved it when we were kids, and we lurrrrve it even more now.

Our refreshing Still Natural Mineral Water is bottled in the Brecon Beacons National Park at the foot of the Black Mountain Range. As refreshing as it gets.

A double shot of freshly ground Fairtrade Espresso and steamed milk. There are two things you should know about us.

1: we love food (obviously) and 2: we absolutely lurrrrve a good Latte.

Our coffee is our own unique blend of mild, high grown and rich tasting Arabica and Robusta beans. Not only does it taste AH-mazing but our beans are 100% Fairtrade. We really could sit and chat forever about the love and care that goes into producing our coffee, as well as the farmers that we support. For more info on this, visit our Responsible Sourcing page.

This little cup of pick-me-up is made just the way you all know and love, with a double shot of freshly ground Espresso and steamed milk. Simple as that.

Freshly ground coffee with a generous helping of foam on top, topped with chocolate powder.

If you’re anything like us you’ll know that drinking coffee is infinitely more fun the frothier you go.

Think about it. Those teeny, tiny bubbles make your drink look just like a miniature bathtub, the chocolate powder on top is to DIE for, and don’t even start us with the milk-stache. Oh yeah.

Our freshly ground coffee is our own unique blend of mild, high grown and rich tasting Arabica and Robusta beans. Not only does it taste pretty darn delicious, but the beans are also 100% Fairtrade.

A simple, quality coffee made with Fairtrade coffee beans and semi-skimmed milk. Short, strong and full of beans. If you’re after a no-nonsense, does what it says on the tin coffee boost, this one should do just the trick.

Of course, at the heart of any great Americano, is a high quality, freshly ground Espresso. Ours is made from our own unique blend of mild, high grown and rich tasting Arabica and Robusta beans. Not only does it taste INCREDIBLE but our coffee beans are 100% Fairtrade.

Tastes good, does good.

Freshly ground Espresso Coffee. Short, strong and full of beans. If you’re after a no-nonsense, does what it says on the tin coffee boost, this one should do just the trick.

Of course, at the heart of any great Americano, is a high quality, freshly ground Espresso. Ours is made from our own unique blend of mild, high grown and rich tasting Arabica and Robusta beans. Not only does it taste INCREDIBLE but our coffee beans are 100% Fairtrade.

Tastes good, does good.

Double Espresso, topped with steamed and lightly frothed milk.

If you’re the type of person looking for a ‘triple-decker-half-caffe-venti-macchiacco’ with your name scribbled incorrectly on the side (it’s Greggs with two G’s, come on)… then we suggest you look away now.

Here at Greggs, we like to keep things simple. Quality products, great prices. That’s why we love the Flat White. Admired by hipsters, grannies, and students alike. This fool-proof coffee order is our go-to crowd pleaser. Double Espresso, topped with steamed and lightly frothed milk. It's strong and served short, just how it's supposed to be.

Oh, and all of our coffee beans are 100% Fairtrade and freshly ground just for you.

A classic English breakfast tea made with Fairtrade Tea leaves. It’s everyone’s go-to drink, whatever the mood. And who can blame them?

Cold? Cup of Tea. Sad? Cup of Tea. Bored? Cup of Tea. Dumped? You guessed it, better grab a cup of Tea. Not only is Tea the solution to most of the nation’s problems, but it also tastes pretty darn excellent. Especially with a Jammie Heart Biscuit.

Deliciously decadent hot chocolate made with Fairtrade milk chocolate. We love chocolate. And by ‘love’ we mean ‘are obsessed with’. But sometimes, a piece of chocolate just won’t cut it, you know? That’s why we’ve turned up the heat, to give to you our deliciously decadent Fairtrade Hot Chocolate.

Personally, it’s a fave of ours for ANY time of year.

…but if you are experiencing a particularly wet and dreary day (let’s face it, it’s the UK), we can guarantee this will hit the spot.

So, have a taste. Let it slowly melt in your mouth, and watch as those rose-tinted, chocolate-shaped endorphins magically reveal themselves. We just LOVE to see all your pretty, smiley faces sipping on this little cup of magic.

Freshly ground Espresso, steamed milk and cocoa. It might look like the Greggs latte that all we know and love, but we promise you what’s inside this little cup is much more than that.

Hear us out: Coffee. AND Hot Chocolate. Together. Genius.

It tastes good, it looks good, it might pick you up a few likes on Insta, win-win really isn’t it? Freshly ground espresso, steamed milk and cocoa. Like all our coffee our Mocha is jam packed with our own unique blend of mild, high grown and rich tasting Arabica and Robusta beans. Not only does it taste bloomin’ marvellous but the coffee beans are 100% Fairtrade.

Seeded oval bite with Mexican style chicken breast and salad. Arribaaa! Let’s hear it for the Mexican Chicken Oval Bite. Packed with slices of Mexican style chicken breast and chipotle chilli sauce, on a bed of fresh salad leaves and chipotle chilli flavoured mayonnaise. It’s the tastiest sandwich this side of the Rio Grande.

Have you tried one? Make a break for Greggs before it’s too late! Like all of our sandwiches, Mexican Chicken Oval Bites are freshly made in our shops every day.

This tasty treat is a source of protein

Tuna with mayonnaise, cucumber and salad leaves in a white and wholemeal roll. Just like that trusty old friend you’ve known since you were a kid, you can always rely on a Tuna Mayonnaise Roll. Made in a pillow-soft white and wholemeal bread roll, filled with tuna chunks mixed with mayonnaise, and finished off with slices of cucumber and fresh salad leaves, our Tuna Mayo Roll is a lunchtime staple. Like all of our sandwiches our Tuna Mayonnaise rolls are made fresh in shops every day.

This tasty treat is a source of protein.

options.articleName: Roast Chicken Mayonnaise and Bacon Sandwich
options.internalDescription: Roast Chicken Mayonnaise and Bacon Sandwich
options.customerDescription:
Soft malted brown bread with roast chicken, mayonnaise and bacon. Chicken. Mayonnaise. Bacon. Happy thoughts.

Okay, we can't 100% guarantee that it'll make you happy. But, we're fairly certain it'll be an incredibly tasty addition to your lunch break.

Our Roast Chicken and Bacon Sandwich is made up of seasoned roast chicken breast in mayonnaise with strips of cooked smoked sweet cure bacon on malted brown bread. Why change a classic, eh?

This tasty treat is a source of protein.

Sliced chargrill flavour chicken and salad served in a seeded Oval Bite. Want unlimited access to the taste of a summer BBQ, any time of the year? Of course you do.

But, juggling a flimsy paper plate, a drink AND trying to eat while having a conversation? It’s a no from us. So, instead we created the almighty Chargrill Chicken Oval Bite.

Slices of chargrill flavour chicken are layered on fresh salad leaves, tomato and cucumber. With honey mustard mayonnaise, served in our seeded Oval Bite.

If that radiant roll call of ingredients doesn’t make it clear enough (and it is very clear), this sandwich does the job at invoking heavy British summer vibes.

This tasty treat is a source of protein

options.articleName: Roast Chicken and Bacon Club Baguette
options.internalDescription: Roast Chicken and Bacon Club Baguette
options.customerDescription:
Classic chicken club with roast chicken in mayonnaise, bacon, tomato and salad. As sandwich masterminds, from time to time we forget to take a step little back and enjoy the simple joy found in chomping down on an old classic.

This one in particular, is delightfully old school and totally delicious.

Our take on the classic Chicken Club includes sliced roast chicken breast in mayonnaise, sweetcure bacon, juicy sliced tomato and fresh salad leaves.

Spoiler alert: you will not resist.

This tasty treat is a source of protein

Honey roast Ham and Cheddar Cheese in a crusty baguette Sometimes, it’s good to stick to what you know.

For example, a superhero sandwich that’s showing no signs of going stale, is the trusty ham and cheese. After all, no self-respecting packed lunch box or party buffet is complete without them.

Crunchy on the outside and wonderfully soft inside, we’ve taken ours up a notch by packing honey roast ham and mature white cheddar cheese into a freshly baked baguette.

Pair with a bag of crisps, and you’re onto a winner.

Tuna mayonnaise, red pepper relish and tangy red onion in a crusty baguette. Why do fish always sing off-key? … because you can’t Tuna Fish.

Okay, we may not be the best at jokes. But, with this delectable combination of tuna in mayonnaise, red pepper relish and tangy red onion; this baguette truly does smash all the other sandwiches out the water.

Super filling, and massive on flavour, it’s crunchy on the outside and wonderfully soft in the middle. Oh, and all of our sandwiches are freshly prepared in shops every day.

Mature Cheddar cheese with tomato, cucumber and salad in a crusty baguette. Ahh... the humble cheese sandwich. What's not to love? Pair this one with some crisps and you're on to a winner. Sliced mature Cheddar cheese, sliced tomato, sliced cucumber and mixed salad leaves in a freshly baked baguette.

Like all of our sandwiches, Mature Cheddar Cheese Salad Baguettes are freshly made in our shops every day. We hope there’s a Greggs sandwich to suit everyone’s taste.

This tasty treat is a source of protein

Mexican style chicken breast with Cheddar cheese and chili in a crusty baguette. Arribaaa! If you like your sandwich with a little sizzle, try our sensational Mexican Chicken Baguette.

Packed with delicious Mexican style chicken breast, Cheddar cheese with chilli, this baguette is packed with crunchy sliced red onion, fiery green jalapeños, chipotle chilli sauce with chipotle chilli mayonnaise. It’s the liveliest lunch this side of Guadalajara.

This tasty treat is a source of protein

Roast chicken breast in mayonnaise with fresh salad leaves in a crusty baguette. We like to keep things simple. Just like our Roast Chicken Mayo Baguette. Handmade with Roast Chicken Breast in Mayonnaise with Fresh Salad Leaves, we let these tasty ingredients speak for themselves.

No secret blend of spices. No sneaky twist. Served in our wonderfully freshly baked baguette, our Roast Chicken Mayo Baguette is big on flavour, low on fuss.

This tasty treat is a source of protein.

Tuna mixed with mayonnaise, freshly made on tasty malted brown bread. Our Tuna and Cucumber Sandwich skips the frills and gets straight on with the flavour.

Made in tasty malted brown bread, tuna is mixed with mayonnaise. We just add a little cucumber for crunch, and then leave it at that. Nice and simple. Like all of our sandwiches our Tuna Mayonnaise and Cucumber sandwiches are made fresh in shops every day.

This tasty treat is a source of protein.

Soft malted brown bread with sliced egg, mayonnaise, and salad cream If you’ve forgotten how good an Egg Mayonnaise Sandwich can be, perhaps it’s time to rediscover this tasty classic.

Sticking to the classic recipe, we combine egg mayonnaise with salad cream and slices of free range egg with just a pinch of black pepper. Sandwiched in our own soft malted brown bread, it’s a delicious blast from the past. No fuss. No fancy ingredients.

We’re also proud owners of a Good Egg Award, so you can rest safe knowing our eggy goodness has been well looked after. The Good Egg Award ensures hens lead a cage-free life, allowing them to express their natural behaviours – freedom to move, to scratch and peck, to dust bathe, to stretch and flap their wings, to walk, to run and to rest.

This tasty treat is a source of protein

Honey roast Ham, tomato, cucumber, salad and mayo on a crusty baguette. We’ve got to give it to salad. It doesn’t always get the best reception. You know what we’re talking about. The usual suspects… tomato, cucumber, salad leaves, and the like. Well, we’re here to tell you that salad is in fact pretty great. Especially when it’s stuffed into a freshly baked baguette with lovely jubbly honey roast ham and mayonnaise.

Yup, this belly-filling, smile-inducing baguette may sound like your average lunchbox favourite, but it’s so much more than that. Don’t believe us? Try it for yourself.

This tasty treat is a source of protein

Mexican style chicken, chipotle chilli sauce, salad, mixed peppers and chipotle chilli mayo in a tortilla wrap.

It might be -2 outside but we promise our fiery Mexican Chicken Chipotle Wrap will have you singing ‘Aribaaa!’ after just one bite.

Filled with tasty Mexican style chicken, fiery chipotle chilli sauce and chipotle chilli flavoured mayonnaise, garnished with fresh salad leaves and mixed peppers, perfectly packed into a soft white tortilla wrap. Lunchtime goals, if we do say so ourselves.

This tasty treat is a source of protein

Carbonated cherry flavour soft drink with sweeteners.

Looking for something to perk your day up?

Fun, fizzy and flavourful, the newest addition to our drinks range is a treat for the eyes and the tastebuds. A cherry flavoured soft drink with sweeteners.

Pair with a Pink Jammy Doughnut for the true pink experience.

Carbonated mango, pineapple and passion fruit soft drink with sweeteners. Gloomy day outside? Wishing you were lying by the pool with a glass of something cold in your hand?

Well, we might not be able to promise the rain will stay away but our Sparkling Mango & Pineapple drink will make you feel like you're in warmer climates.

Tangy, tasty and tropical... it really is summer in a bottle!

A sparkling classic drink made from real lemon juice.

This sparkling classic is the perfect addition to any meal time. Made from real lemon juice from concentrate and sweeteners. A refreshing drink full of flavour and all for only 15 calories.

A classic raspberry flavoured sparkling drink. The Sparkling Raspberry Lemonade.

Deliciously raspberry flavoured, this sweet, fruity and fizzy little bombshell delivers a splash of perfectly pink hue onto our shelves, making for the most Instagrammable soft drink on the Greggs menu. If you’re looking for an even bigger dose of pink, why not pair it with a Pink Jammie Doughnut?

Refreshing on a hot day, and just as tasty on a cold one; we loved it when we were kids, and we lurrrrve it even more now.

Fairtrade Orange Juice made from concentrate.

Perfect for breakfast (or any meal, come to think of it).

The sharp, orangey flavours make for a punchy soft drink that treats your taste buds to a party! The perfect contrast of sweet and sour, this fabulous looking and even better tasting concoction offers optimum flavour satisfaction. Top tier.

If you're looking to be whisked away to a hot summer's day then look no further.

Fairtrade Orange Juice made from concentrate.

Classically refreshing Fairtrade Apple Juice.

Sip sip, hurray!

We know you. We know you spent years leaving that apple in your lunchbox.

But, now you’ve truly come to appreciate the wonder of the flavour of apple. And good news, we’re here to make it even better.

A little sharp and super sweet, our Apple Juice is so classically refreshing that it doesn’t need the big sell. Not only does it taste great but our Apple Juice is one of your five a day (per 150ml) and 100% Fairtrade.

(Recommended 150ml portion of apple juice counts as 1 of your 5-a-day. Apple Juice made from concentrate)

Made in tasty malted brown bread, tuna is mixed with mayonnaise. We just add a little cucumber for crunch, and then leave it at that. Nice and simple. Like all of our sandwiches our Tuna Mayonnaise and Cucumber sandwiches are made fresh in shops every day.

This tasty treat is a source of protein.

Soft malted brown bread with sliced egg, mayonnaise, and salad cream If you’ve forgotten how good an Egg Mayonnaise Sandwich can be, perhaps it’s time to rediscover this tasty classic.

Sticking to the classic recipe, we combine egg mayonnaise with salad cream and slices of free range egg with just a pinch of black pepper. Sandwiched in our own soft malted brown bread, it’s a delicious blast from the past. No fuss. No fancy ingredients.

We’re also proud owners of a Good Egg Award, so you can rest safe knowing our eggy goodness has been well looked after. The Good Egg Award ensures hens lead a cage-free life, allowing them to express their natural behaviours – freedom to move, to scratch and peck, to dust bathe, to stretch and flap their wings, to walk, to run and to rest.

This tasty treat is a source of protein

articleName: Roast Chicken Mayonnaise and Bacon Sandwich
internalDescription: Roast Chicken Mayonnaise and Bacon Sandwich
customerDescription:
Soft malted brown bread with roast chicken, mayonnaise and bacon. Chicken. Mayonnaise. Bacon. Happy thoughts.

Okay, we can't 100% guarantee that it'll make you happy. But, we're fairly certain it'll be an incredibly tasty addition to your lunch break.

Our Roast Chicken and Bacon Sandwich is made up of seasoned roast chicken breast in mayonnaise with strips of cooked smoked sweet cure bacon on malted brown bread. Why change a classic, eh?

This tasty treat is a source of protein.

Barbeque flavour chicken and smoked bacon pasta in a mayonnaise style dressing. Need a salad that’s big on flavour? Then look no further, with our Chicken and Bacon Pasta.

Made up of delicious pasta and sweetcorn in a chive mayonnaise style dressing with sliced barbeque flavour chicken and smoked bacon pieces.

articleName: Smoky Cajun Rice with BBQ Chicken and Sweetcorn Fritters
internalDescription: Smoky Cajun Rice with BBQ Chicken and Sweetcorn Fritters
customerDescription:
BBQ flavour chicken slices and sweetcorn fritters with smoky Cajun rice. Part of our Balanced Choice range, our Smoky Cajun Rice with BBQ Chicken and Sweetcorn Fritters is the ideal dish for those lighter lunches.

Made with tasty BBQ flavour chicken slices, delicious sweetcorn fritters and cooked brown rice in a smoky paprika dressing. Served with a side of sliced spinach and pickled red onions for an extra kick.
Choose one of our famous sweet treats with a hot drink

options.customerDescription:
Sugar coated doughnut filled with delicious apple and raspberry jam filling. Caramel Custard Doughnut a little too razzle dazzle for your taste?

Then behold, the Jam Doughnut. An A-lister doughnut with mysterious origins (German really?) fans from all walks of life, and an invite to pretty much any decent Afternoon Tea.

But, at its heart, our take on the Daddy of all doughnuts is a finely balanced mix of delectable apple and raspberry jam filling, a pillowy-soft doughnut and a sugar coating for that subtle crunch.

A timeless classic.

Fabulously fluffy and flakey all butter Croissant. We don’t know about you, but we think it’s about time you switched things up from your usual, boring toast. No offence, toast.

Blissfully fluffy. Moreishly buttery. Fabulously flakey.

Our delicious All Butter Croissant - perfect for snacking on the go, or serving up with a continental breakfast, the Parisians really do know how to eat in style.

Golden pastry with a rich dark chocolate filling.

Everyone knows that the only thing better than breakfast is… well dessert, obviously. But, combine the two together? Pure magic.

It is widely acknowledged (and we tend to agree) that chocolate is a superior dessert compared to the rest. Similarly, Greggs pastries are simply devine, so pair the two together and; ‘Voila!’, you’re onto a winner.

Deliciously soft, our deliciously decadent Pain au Chocolat is great for snacking on the go, or from the comfort of your own bed.

Watch out for crumbs, though.

Custard filled doughnut with a caramel flavour fondant topping. TWO WORDS: CARAMEL. CUSTARD.

First of all, we’ll just sit here for a minute while you contain yourself…

Sorted? Good.

There’s no denying we’re a nation of custard lovers. This gloriously versatile, school dinner favourite can be added to pretty much any dessert to take it from 0-100. Apple crumble? Sure. Victoria Sponge? Absolutely. Cornflakes? We’re all for it. AND, if the delectable custard flavour doughnut isn’t dreamy enough, we’ve only gone and stuck our caramel flavour fondant on top!

A taste sensation for anyone with a sweet tooth.

Chocolate muffin with a rich centre of smooth chocolate flavoured sauce. If you’re not fond of cake, chocolate and good times please look away now.

Being the purveyors of the finest baked goods, we’re pretty much hard-wired to LOVE getting our feed on with delicious, flavour-dense snacks.

The Triple Chocolate Muffin certainly fits the bill: with chunks of moreish chocolate, this decadent chocolate muffin has a rich centre of smooth chocolate flavoured sauce.

Go chocolate or go home, we say.

Chocolate flavour cookie made with milk, white and dark chocolate chunks. The validity of how good a cuppa is, is determined by which biscuit you’re dipping in it. FACT. So, make sure you do it right. But hell, our cookies are so good, we recommend ordering (and not sharing) every single last one. Got to be sure you’ve picked the right flavour, right?

Milk Chocolate. White Chocolate. Triple Chocolate. The A team. Or, G Team, if you will.

Our cookies are soft, crumbly and are made with milk, white and dark chocolate chunks, something for all chocolate lovers. Or, just ‘people’ as we like to call them. ‘Cause you know, who doesn’t like chocolate?

Cookie made with milk chocolate chunks.

The validity of how good a cuppa is, is determined by which biscuit you’re dipping in it. FACT. So, make sure you do it right. But hell, our cookies are so good, we recommend ordering (and not sharing) every single last one.

Our milk chocolate cookies are soft, crumbly and are made with milk chocolate chunks, something for all chocolate lovers. Or, just ‘people’ as we like to call them. ‘Cause you know, who doesn’t like chocolate?

Cookie made with white chocolate chunks.

The validity of how good a cuppa is, is determined by which biscuit you’re dipping in it. FACT. So, make sure you do it right.

Our White Chocolate Cookies are soft, crumbly and made with white chocolate chunks, something for all chocolate lovers. Or, just ‘people’ as we like to call them. ‘Cause you know, who doesn’t like chocolate?

Shortcrust pastry, filled with fruit mincemeat and a dusting of icing sugar. There’s a lot of things us Brits are proud to call our own, but we have to be honest, the Sweet Mince Pie is definitely up there with one of the best.

A delicious, sweet treat with a noble English origin, nothing marks the start of the festive season quite like a Sweet Mince Pie!

Made from crumbly shortcrust pastry, filled with a sweet mincemeat made from vine fruits, Bramley apple, candied orange & lemon peel, perfectly finished with a light dusting of icing sugar. Our Vegan Friendly Sweet Mince Pies are a thing of beauty!

A double shot of freshly ground Fairtrade Espresso and steamed milk. There are two things you should know about us.

1: we love food (obviously) and 2: we absolutely lurrrrve a good Latte.

Our coffee is our own unique blend of mild, high grown and rich tasting Arabica and Robusta beans. Not only does it taste AH-mazing but our beans are 100% Fairtrade. We really could sit and chat forever about the love and care that goes into producing our coffee, as well as the farmers that we support. For more info on this, visit our Responsible Sourcing page.

This little cup of pick-me-up is made just the way you all know and love, with a double shot of freshly ground Espresso and steamed milk. Simple as that.

Freshly ground coffee with a generous helping of foam on top, topped with chocolate powder.

If you’re anything like us you’ll know that drinking coffee is infinitely more fun the frothier you go.

Think about it. Those teeny, tiny bubbles make your drink look just like a miniature bathtub, the chocolate powder on top is to DIE for, and don’t even start us with the milk-stache. Oh yeah.

Our freshly ground coffee is our own unique blend of mild, high grown and rich tasting Arabica and Robusta beans. Not only does it taste pretty darn delicious, but the beans are also 100% Fairtrade.

A simple, quality coffee made with Fairtrade coffee beans and semi-skimmed milk. Short, strong and full of beans. If you’re after a no-nonsense, does what it says on the tin coffee boost, this one should do just the trick.

Of course, at the heart of any great Americano, is a high quality, freshly ground Espresso. Ours is made from our own unique blend of mild, high grown and rich tasting Arabica and Robusta beans. Not only does it taste INCREDIBLE but our coffee beans are 100% Fairtrade.

Tastes good, does good.

Freshly ground Espresso Coffee. Short, strong and full of beans. If you’re after a no-nonsense, does what it says on the tin coffee boost, this one should do just the trick.

Of course, at the heart of any great Americano, is a high quality, freshly ground Espresso. Ours is made from our own unique blend of mild, high grown and rich tasting Arabica and Robusta beans. Not only does it taste INCREDIBLE but our coffee beans are 100% Fairtrade.

Tastes good, does good.

Double Espresso, topped with steamed and lightly frothed milk.

If you’re the type of person looking for a ‘triple-decker-half-caffe-venti-macchiacco’ with your name scribbled incorrectly on the side (it’s Greggs with two G’s, come on)… then we suggest you look away now.

Here at Greggs, we like to keep things simple. Quality products, great prices. That’s why we love the Flat White. Admired by hipsters, grannies, and students alike. This fool-proof coffee order is our go-to crowd pleaser. Double Espresso, topped with steamed and lightly frothed milk. It's strong and served short, just how it's supposed to be.

Oh, and all of our coffee beans are 100% Fairtrade and freshly ground just for you.

A double shot of Espresso, steamed milk, sweet vanilla syrup and not forgetting the 'piece de resistance' cream topping.

Our delicious Vanilla Latte is made with freshly ground Fairtrade coffee beans, semi-skimmed milk, vanilla flavour syrup, topped with hot chocolate powder. Yum.

A classic English breakfast tea made with Fairtrade Tea leaves. It’s everyone’s go-to drink, whatever the mood. And who can blame them?

Cold? Cup of Tea. Sad? Cup of Tea. Bored? Cup of Tea. Dumped? You guessed it, better grab a cup of Tea. Not only is Tea the solution to most of the nation’s problems, but it also tastes pretty darn excellent. Especially with a Jammie Heart Biscuit.

Deliciously decadent hot chocolate made with Fairtrade milk chocolate. We love chocolate. And by ‘love’ we mean ‘are obsessed with’. But sometimes, a piece of chocolate just won’t cut it, you know? That’s why we’ve turned up the heat, to give to you our deliciously decadent Fairtrade Hot Chocolate.

Personally, it’s a fave of ours for ANY time of year.

…but if you are experiencing a particularly wet and dreary day (let’s face it, it’s the UK), we can guarantee this will hit the spot.

So, have a taste. Let it slowly melt in your mouth, and watch as those rose-tinted, chocolate-shaped endorphins magically reveal themselves. We just LOVE to see all your pretty, smiley faces sipping on this little cup of magic.

Freshly ground Espresso, steamed milk and cocoa. It might look like the Greggs latte that all we know and love, but we promise you what’s inside this little cup is much more than that.

Hear us out: Coffee. AND Hot Chocolate. Together. Genius.

It tastes good, it looks good, it might pick you up a few likes on Insta, win-win really isn’t it? Freshly ground espresso, steamed milk and cocoa. Like all our coffee our Mocha is jam packed with our own unique blend of mild, high grown and rich tasting Arabica and Robusta beans. Not only does it taste bloomin’ marvellous but the coffee beans are 100% Fairtrade.

Strong, black coffee shot. Short, strong and full of beans. If you’re after a no-nonsense, does what it says on the tin coffee boost, our Espresso should do just the trick.

At the heart of any great Espresso, is high quality, freshly ground beans. That’s why ours are our own unique blend of mild, high grown and rich tasting Arabica and Robusta beans. Not only does it taste INCREDIBLE but our beans are 100% Fairtrade too.

Tastes good, does good.

Delicious shortbread with caramel, covered in milk chocolate. The perfect sweet and crumbly treat to go with your afternoon cuppa!

Our four pack of delighfully crumbly Shortbreads are topped with melt in the mouth caramel with a milk chocolate coating.

Chocolate brownies with milk and white chocolate chunks. Love chocolate? Our Triple Chocolate Brownies are about as chocolate-y as it gets. Made from smooth Fairtrade dark chocolate* and packed with mouth-watering chunks of milk and white chocolate. Honestly. Try one. You can thank us later.

*Chocolate contains Fairtrade Sourced Ingredient: Cocoa
A slice of delicious freshly baked pizza with a drink - a perfect combination!

options.customerDescription:
Focaccia style pizza with a blend of cheeses and sliced pepperoni.

Clever bunch, the Italians. Not only were they famous for ice cream and opera singing, they’re also responsible for the greatest bready creation since... well, sliced bread.

So, if there were ever a time to pat the Italians on the back and thank them for creating such exceptional eats, it’s now.

Inspired by our Italian cousins, our focaccia style Pepperoni Pizza has a rich layer of our unique recipe pizza sauce, covered in a blend of cheeses with sliced pepperoni. Magnifico!

A blend of cheeses on a tomato focaccia style base.

Creative bunch, the Italians. Not only were they famous for aqueducts and mascarpone cheese, they’re also responsible for the greatest bready creation since... well, sliced bread!

So, if there were ever a time to pat the Italians on the back and thank them for creating such exceptional eats, it’s now.

Our Margherita Pizza has a blend of cheeses on a focaccia style base. Plus, the sauciest pizza sauce that you ever did taste. If that doesn’t make you want to kiss your fingers and shout ‘Magnifico!’, we don’t know what will.

Focaccia style pizza with cheese, Mexican style chicken, jalapenos and red onion.

It has often been said that you can’t beat our saucey, focaccia style pizza slices. That was of course until we introduced the new kid on the block, our Spicy Mexican Chicken Pizza.

Made with a rich layer of our unique recipe pizza sauce, topped with a blend of cheeses, cooked sliced Mexican style chicken, sliced jalapenos and sliced red onions. A lunchtime hero with just the right amount kick!

Focaccia style pizza with cheese, sliced pepperoni, jalapenos and red onion.

Some say our focaccia style pizza slices are enough to give the Italians a run for their money. When it comes to our Pepperoni Hot Shot pizza, we’d have to agree.

A focaccia style pizza made with a rich layer of our unique recipe pizza sauce, topped with a blend of cheeses, pepperoni, jalapenos, and red onions. A lunchtime hero with just the right amount kick!

Carbonated cherry flavour soft drink with sweeteners.

Looking for something to perk your day up?

Fun, fizzy and flavourful, the newest addition to our drinks range is a treat for the eyes and the tastebuds. A cherry flavoured soft drink with sweeteners.

Pair with a Pink Jammy Doughnut for the true pink experience.

Carbonated mango, pineapple and passion fruit soft drink with sweeteners. Gloomy day outside? Wishing you were lying by the pool with a glass of something cold in your hand?

Well, we might not be able to promise the rain will stay away but our Sparkling Mango & Pineapple drink will make you feel like you're in warmer climates.

Tangy, tasty and tropical... it really is summer in a bottle!

A sparkling classic drink made from real lemon juice.

This sparkling classic is the perfect addition to any meal time. Made from real lemon juice from concentrate and sweeteners. A refreshing drink full of flavour and all for only 15 calories.

A classic raspberry flavoured sparkling drink. The Sparkling Raspberry Lemonade.

Deliciously raspberry flavoured, this sweet, fruity and fizzy little bombshell delivers a splash of perfectly pink hue onto our shelves, making for the most Instagrammable soft drink on the Greggs menu. If you’re looking for an even bigger dose of pink, why not pair it with a Pink Jammie Doughnut?

Refreshing on a hot day, and just as tasty on a cold one; we loved it when we were kids, and we lurrrrve it even more now.

Fairtrade Orange Juice made from concentrate.

Perfect for breakfast (or any meal, come to think of it).

The sharp, orangey flavours make for a punchy soft drink that treats your taste buds to a party! The perfect contrast of sweet and sour, this fabulous looking and even better tasting concoction offers optimum flavour satisfaction. Top tier.

If you're looking to be whisked away to a hot summer's day then look no further.

Fairtrade Orange Juice made from concentrate.

Perfect for breakfast (or any meal, come to think of it), our Fairtrade Orange Juice is made from concentrate

The sharp, orangey flavours make for a punchy soft drink that treats your taste buds to a party! The perfect contrast of sweet and sour, this fabulous looking and even better tasting concoction offers optimum flavour satisfaction. Top tier.

If you're looking to be whisked away to a hot summer's day then look no further.

Classically refreshing Fairtrade Apple Juice.

Sip sip, hurray!

We know you. We know you spent years leaving that apple in your lunchbox.

But, now you’ve truly come to appreciate the wonder of the flavour of apple. And good news, we’re here to make it even better.

A little sharp and super sweet, our Apple Juice is so classically refreshing that it doesn’t need the big sell. Not only does it taste great but our Apple Juice is one of your five a day (per 150ml) and 100% Fairtrade.

(Recommended 150ml portion of apple juice counts as 1 of your 5-a-day. Apple Juice made from concentrate)

Small still Natural Water bottled in the Brecon Beacons. Playing in the paddling pool. Brushing our teeth. Powering a gym session. Where would we be without this little fella?

Sure, water may be the slightly more boring, predictable and dependable member of the soft drinks family. But, it’s still a gem to us.

Our refreshing Still Natural Mineral Water is bottled in the Brecon Beacons National Park at the foot of the Black Mountain Range. As refreshing as it gets.

Our hot Yum Yum’s are, yes you guessed it, HOT pieces of pillow soft doughnut covered in a sticky sugar glaze and served with a tasty milk chocolate or salted caramel flavour dipping sauce.

customerDescription: Tasty soup made with smoked bacon, pork sausage, chicken, turkey, stuffing and veg. Everyone loves a good old Christmas dinner. It looks good, it smells good, it tastes EVEN better. Lucky for you, we’ve turned your Christmas dinner favourites into a handy, enjoy on-the-go soup. Made with diced smoked bacon, pork sausage, tasty chicken, turkey, sage & onion stuffing and vegetables, blended with a delicious mix of herbs and spices. It really is Christmas in a cup!

Delicious creamy soup made with a blend of tomatoes. There's nothing quite as warming on a cold winters day as a good serving of Tomato Soup.

A blend of tomatoes, served hot.

articleName: Ham and Mature Cheddar Cheese Toastie
internalDescription: Ham and Mature Cheddar Cheese Toastie
customerDescription:
Honey roast ham and mature Cheddar cheese on toasted bread with Bechamel sauce. Sometimes, a classic childhood favourite is the only thing that’ll hit the spot.

For instance, a lunchtime champion that’s showing no signs of losing its top tier status, is the ham and cheese toastie.

In true Greggs style, we’ve taken the British classic up a notch, adding tasty Bechamel sauce to sliced honey roast ham and a tangy mature Cheddar cheese. Sort of like a ham and cheese Sandwich, except toasted, and posher.

Because, hello... everyone knows that melted cheese is infinitely more tasty than regular cheese.

Cooked pork sausages, smoked bacon with stuffing and cranberry sauce in a white baguette.

We’re not over here claiming to have invented the Christmas Dinner, that thing dates back well before our time. But luckily for you, we’ve got the next best thing. That’s right, our Pigs Under Blankets Baguette is back. A tasty baguette with all the trimmings. Except sprouts (obviously!)

Perfectly cooked pork sausages with smoked sweetcure bacon topped with pork, onion & sage stuffing, wonderfully garnished with cranberry and port sauce in a freshly baked crusty white baguette. Head over heels in love? Drooling just thinking about it? Yeah, us too.

Sage & onion plant-based goujons with onion gravy and cranberry and port sauce in a freshly baked baguette.

The news you’ve all been waiting for… Our vegan Christmas menu is growing! Say hello to the Vegan Turkey-Free & Stuffing Baguette. Made with tasty sage & onion plant-based goujons developed with the help of our friends at THIS!™, covered in a mouth-watering onion gravy and garnished with a classic cranberry and port sauce. All your favourite vegan-friendly Christmas trimmings, packed into freshly baked baguette. It’s a Christmas cracker!

Honey roast ham with melted cheddar cheese on a freshly baked crusty baguette. Sometimes, it’s good to stick to what you know.

For example, a superhero sandwich that’s showing no signs of going stale, is the trusty ham and cheese. After all, no self-respecting packed lunch box or party buffet is complete without them.

Crunchy on the outside and wonderfully soft inside, we’ve taken ours up a notch by packing honey roast ham and mature white cheddar cheese into a freshly baked baguette.

Pair with a bag of crisps, and you’re onto a winner.

Coated chicken strips with cheese, red onion and chipotle sauce in a crusty baguette. The perfect hot baguette… doesn’t exist- Wait. What’s this? Can it be? An absolutely bang-on-the-money, fail safe sarnie with a crunch that packs a punch? That’s right, friends.

Southern fried style coated chicken strips, sliced mature Cheddar cheese, sliced red onion and chipotle chilli sauce, packed into a crunchy white baguette. This certified lunchtime fave is guaranteed to make you go ‘Mmmmmmmm’.

This tasty treat is a source of protein

Chicken breast slices with sage and onion stuffing and chicken gravy in a crusty baguette. Let’s be honest, there’s not a lot that can top a Sunday roast served with steaming hot gravy. But ever tried to eat one in the car or on your way to the match? Not ideal.

What if we told you, you could have your Sunday roast favourites packed into a handy freshly baked, crunchy on the outside, wonderfully soft on the inside baguette?

That’s where we come in. We’ve taken the sandwich world up a notch with this one.

Succulent roast chicken breast slices, coated in sage & onion stuffing with a generous helping of rich chicken gravy, packed into a delicious, freshly baked baguette.

Some call it a masterpiece, we just call it Greggs.
